snippet: The Gewandhaus Orchestra of Leipzig, led by Riccardo Chailly, and the conductor Ivan Fischer and the Budapest Festival Orchestra will come to New York next season as part of Lincoln Center’s Great Performers series.
abstract: The Gewandhaus Orchestra of Leipzig, led by Riccardo Chailly, and the conductor Ivan Fischer and the Budapest Festival Orchestra will come to New York next season as part of Lincoln Center’s Great Performers series.
